mapper.insert: insert into myBoard(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from myBoard where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, writer, regDate, viewCnt from myBoard order by bno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
